== Colorado LoCo Team ==
<nowiki>[[File:coloco.png]]</nowiki>

The Colorado <nowiki>[[LoCoTeams|Local Community Team]]</nowiki> (aka Co``Lo``Co) advocates the use of Open Source software and Ubuntu Linux in the State of WikiPedia:Colorado, USA.  This is done through CD distribution, team expansion, user-base support, and outreach programs.

The Colorado Local Community Team is '''not''' meant to replace our local LUGs but rather enhance their overall experience by having a dedicated place to discuss, contribute, and gain
support from local Ubuntu users.

While we were not the first Local Community Team in the USA, we were the first to complete the official process and become fully recognized by the Ubuntu <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntu.com/community/processes/council|Community Council]]</nowiki>.  We are a member of the <nowiki>[[USTeams|US Team]]</nowiki> mentoring program.

=== About Us ===

==== Our Goals ====
* Increase awareness in the community and make our name known.
* Bring more teachers on board, especially elementary.
* Develop more relationships like the one Paul Casey has with <nowiki>[[http://www.longmontfreeu.com/|Longmont Free University]]</nowiki>.
* Execute our outreach program.
* LUG Talks
* Enhance our web presence: /EnhancedLoCoWeb

==== What We Do ====
* Educate the public about Ubuntu
* Supply Ubuntu (CDs & CD images)
* Support Ubuntu Locally
* Conduct outreach programs
* Ubuntu Activism
* Partner with local businesses and Educational institutions to further Ubuntu

==== Local ISOs and Packages ====
* '''Local Ubuntu mirror''': provided by our good friends at <nowiki>[[http://tummy.com|Tummy.com]]</nowiki>
** substitute <code>http://mirrors.tummy.com/mirrors/ftp.ubuntulinux.org/ubuntu</code> for <code>http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/</code> and <code>http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/</code> in  etc/apt/sources.list.
* '''Local Ubuntu mirror''': provided by CU Denver Association for Computing Machinery group.
** substitute <code>http://cudlug.cudenver.edu/ubuntu/</code> for <code>http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/</code> and <code>http://us.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/</code> in  /etc/apt/sources.list.
** ISO images available at <code>http://cudlug.cudenver.edu/ubuntu-cd/</code>

=== Membership ===

==== Joining The Team ====

If you are interested in joining our team please apply on our <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/people/coloradoteam/|Launchpad page]]</nowiki> and then subscribe to the mailing list below.  All that is required is residency in or near Colorado and a desire to see Ubuntu grow.

Members must sign the Ubuntu <nowiki>[[http://www.ubuntulinux.org/community/conduct/|Code of Conduct]]</nowiki>. We encourage members to do this via Launchpad.
Then please edit this wiki page and add your name to the team list further down.
